title: Topic 006 Question 006
body: You have an Azure subscription that is linked to an Azure AD tenant and contains the virtual machines shown in the following table.
The subnets of the virtual networks have the service endpoints shown in the following table.
You create the resources shown in the following table.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
